theme_strategy.rationale: Productivity tool for non-technical users. Needs to feel clean, approachable, and 'easier than Excel'. Light theme reduces eye strain for data-heavy tasks in well-lit office environments.

headings.usage: All section titles, page headers, and modal titles. DO NOT use Inter.

mono.usage: SKUs, Order IDs, Financial Data, Code snippets.

primary.name: Deep Indigo
primary.usage: Primary actions, active states, branding. Trustworthy and professional.

secondary.name: Slate Mist
secondary.usage: Secondary buttons, backgrounds for muted elements.

accent.name: Signal Orange
accent.usage: Low stock alerts, critical notifications, 'Call to Action' highlights.

rules: Use h-full on children to ensure they stretch.

overrides.style: Flat, rectangular, no shadow by default. 1px border-border. Hover: shadow-sm.
overrides.instruction: Avoid the 'floating card' look. Make it feel like a dashboard panel.

overrides.style: Dense, sticky header, zebra striping (optional but recommended for long lists).
overrides.instruction: Use 'JetBrains Mono' for numeric columns. Right-align numbers.

overrides.style: Sharp corners or slightly rounded (rounded-md). No pill shapes for main actions.
overrides.instruction: Primary buttons use Deep Indigo. Destructive buttons use Red.

libraries.icons: Lucide React (default), Phosphor Icons (for specific dashboard needs)

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay on the sidebar or auth background to kill digital flatness.
visual_enhancers.shadows: Minimal. Use 'shadow-sm' for active elements. Avoid large drop shadows.
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid borders are preferred over shadows for separation.

auth_background.description: Stacked blue, orange, and white plastic crates. Abstract representation of inventory.

empty_state_inventory.description: Ocean network express containers. Pink and blue concrete building.

universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) for sticky headers.
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
All interactive and key informational elements MUST include a 'data-testid' attribute.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a Smart Inventory App. Follow the 'Swiss Logistics' theme. Prioritize data density and clarity. Use the provided image URLs for the auth and empty states. Ensure the dashboard grid is dense but readable. Use 'Manrope' for all headings to give it a distinct personality. Do not ask clarifying questions. Proceed with implementation.
